correctness.rationale: Major factual and schema issues. Key problems: (1) Schema violations: 'plasmaPower' is set to null but must be an object or omitted; purgeTime units/values use 8 ms where the article reports 8 s or 20 s (1000× error). (2) Invented or untraceable parameters: reactor pressure (1 mmHg), all flow rates, nucleationPeriod (10 cycles), saturation (True), uniformity (5%), conformality (aspect ratio 10), film composition by XPS (values and 1:1 ratio), refractive index, absorption coefficient, band gap via Tauc/UV-Vis, film density (wrong unit GM-PER-DeciM3 and unreported), and all TFT device properties—none are in the article. (3) Inconsistencies/misassignments: film thickness 90 nm combined with 100 °C (Table I shows 90 nm at 130 °C; 100 °C sample is 115 nm); electrical resistivity reported as 2.4 Ω·m conflicts with Table I (conductivity 24 Ω−1·cm implies ~4×10^-4 Ω·m); carrier density given as 1e19 with unit C·m^-3 is dimensionally and numerically incorrect (article gives 1×10^19 cm^-3; correct SI would be ~1×10^25 m^-3 if using PER-M3, or multiplied by e for C-PER-M3). (4) Partial matches: ALD method (thermal), materials (ZnO via DEZn/H2O), reactor (Savannah-100), substrates (glass, Si), temperature range includes 100 °C, and GPC ~1.8 Å/cycle are consistent. Overall, most values are incorrect, ungrounded, or inconsistent with the source and/or schema; numerous required fields were filled with fabricated data. Properties needing correction/review include pressure, purgeTime (units/values), resistivity/carrier density units and magnitudes, film thickness vs temperature consistency, optical and device properties, film composition/density, flow rates, nucleation period, and removal of null 'plasmaPower'.

completeness.rationale: Extraction is largely incorrect and incomplete versus the article and the schema. Key issues: (1) Multiple processes not captured: the paper reports three ALD series (different DEZn pulse times: 20/90/60 ms; H2O purge times: 8 s for series I/II and 20 s for series III) across 90–200 °C with 500 and 1000 cycles; only one process is extracted. (2) Purge times are wrong in value and units: recorded as 8 ms; article specifies 8 s (8000 ms) and 20 s (20000 ms) after H2O for series III. (3) Schema violation: plasmaPower is set to null; the field is optional and should be omitted for TALD. (4) Untraceable/invented parameters: reactor pressure, all flow rates, uniformity, conformality, refractive index, absorption coefficient, XPS composition (elemental concentration and atomic ratio), and film density are not reported in the article but are populated with arbitrary values. (5) Electrical inconsistencies: carrier density uses unit C-PER-M3 with an unconverted value (1e19 cm^-3 should be 1e25 PER-M3 if used); resistivity (2.4 Ω·m) contradicts Table I (e.g., 24 S/cm at 130 °C implies ~4.2e-4 Ω·m); mobility and thickness correspond to the 130 °C sample but the process temperature is set to 100 °C. (6) Optical characterization is misassigned: band gap via “Tauc plot from UV-Vis” and refractive index are not reported; the article uses PL at RT and does not provide those values. (7) Nucleation period (10 cycles) and saturation flag are asserted without support. (8) Roughness value (0.4 nm) is not tied to the stated 100 °C condition; article indicates sub‑1 nm rms only for ≥150 °C. To improve, represent each reported series as separate processes with correct pulse/purge timings and temperatures; fix purge time units/values; remove null plasmaPower; restrict parameters to those traceable (omit pressure/flows/uniformity/conformality/XPS/density/device metrics); correct electrical units/conversions and align sample temperature with reported thickness/mobility; and align optical characterization to PL data reported.
